name: Boost or Bust
description:
Billy the bouncy alien fell into a volcano! Can you help him out? All he has on him is an old beat-up jetpack. It might work... but it could also be risky.

Made by Ian C. for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam: "Roll of the Dice"

Background music track was made by Jan125 on OpenGameArt:  Stereotypical 90's space shooter music

Game made in Phaser.js. Art made using Aseprite and sound effects with Bfxr and Chiptone.

Thanks for playing!
